overview: Diego is now 35 years old. His friends think that his life is boring and measured so they give the guy an unusual gift for his birthday. None of the friends could have imagined that Diego has his own hidden secrets, one of them being Stella, the bar owner. Another secret is a passion for perfumes. Diego longs to get Stella into bed and also dreams of creating an extraordinary scent.
title: L'elisir d'amore
